transcript:
Customer: Mam pehle mujhe ye batao minimum order quantity kya karte ho bulk me deal karte ho ya fir single piece.
Hello?
Customer: Hello. Yes sir.
Executive: Ji madam good afternoon. Aapka call aaya tha madam incoming IndiaMART ke customer ke through bataiye. Raju Prajapati baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Yes sir. Yes sir. Kya concern hai?
Executive: Sir hum biomass jo hai na uske hamare pass inquiries zyada aa rahi hai.
Customer: Achha biomass se zyada inquiry aa raha hai aapka. Thik hai, thik hai. Ek baar wo kijiye ga catalog open kijiye.
Customer: Achha biomass briquette ka matlab bahut saare inquiry aa raha hai na aapko ye concern hai. Thik hai.
Executive: To sabse pehle aap us pe jaaiye product pe jaaiye.
Customer: Thik hai sir product pe gayi.
Executive: Product pe gaye aapne aur dekhiye right side me na more options ka ek tab diya hoga na more options ka.
Customer: Right side. Mila?
Executive: Yes sir.
Executive: More options pe jaaiye cursor leke aur waha pe category report pe click kijiye aap.
Customer: Category report. Mam aap ye wala bata rahi thi na aapko camera wala.
Executive: Dekhiye ye jo green me likha hua hai na wo sab aapke category hai jinse jo jo aapne add kiya theek hai. Ab bataiye biomass ke alawa kyuki usme zyada leads aa rahe hai aapko matlab leads aa rahe hai. Uske alawa aapko kis me matlab zyada aapko weightage chahiye kis category me matlab aapko leads zyada chahiye. Pressure cleaning system me chahiye air release wall me chahiye ya pressure reducing wall me chahiye kis me chahiye bataiye.
Customer: Sir main to hume boilers me chahiye lekin boilers ki kuch inquiry zyada nahi aa rahi. Walls ki aa rahi hai pressure ki aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achha boiler maintenance ka chahiye aapko na. Boiler maintenance ka chahiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai aur iski dealing area kya hai pan India hai ya apna state hai?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Dealing area iska pan India ya apna state matlab ya local me?
Customer: Local me sir.
Executive: Zyada tar local me thik hai iske alawa boiler maintenance ke alawa?
Customer: Boiler sand and ye jo hydro cleaning services hai wo.
Executive: Achha thik hai ek second. To aap wapas se product by leads pe aaiye.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: By leads pe aaiye aur waha pe jo search bar bana hua hai na dekhiye waha pe category likha hua hai thik hai category likha hua hai na location ke bagal me category likha hua hai. To waha pe jaake likhiye boiler maintenance aapko jo bhi category chahiye na waha pe likhiye.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Hmm. Kya likha aapne batao mai bhi idhar se nikal raha hu.
Customer: Boiler maintenance.
Executive: Boiler maintenance ek second.
Executive: IBR boiler maintenance service na?
Customer: Yes sir ya fir boiler sand likhiye sir boiler sand ka bhi chahiye.
Executive: Achha boiler tank ka bhi chalega?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Dekhiye to koi leads abhi found ho raha hai waha pe search karne ka. Koi lead aa raha hai matlab jo jo jis category ka aapko chahiye na waha pe wo filter lagaiye aap us category me.
Customer: Sir filter lagaya boiler weight sand ka but usme koi leads available nahi hai.
Executive: Leads nahi hai that means leads abhi nahi available hai. Okay.
Executive: Okay thik hai thik hai thik hai. Aap ek kaam kijiye ga thik hai iska jo general matlab jo tarika hai na aap dekho aapko jo category zyada chahiye thik hai jaise aapko boiler maintenance se zyada chahiye to sabse pehle aap na system jab bhi aap login karo boiler maintenance ki category aap add karke us lead ko find out karo thik hai. Us lead ko agar aap find out karte ho thik hai in case milta hai agar milta hai to usko immediately purchase karo thik hai. Even though nahi bhi milta na to aap filter apply karo isse hamare system ko pata chalta hai thik hai ki aap kya required karte ho. Aur thodi thodi biomass ki jo inquiry hai na uski aap kam kar dijiye.
Executive: But but jo aapko zyada chahiye right jo aapko zyada chahiye uski category laga ke filter karo aap.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Haan aur isme aur koi problem aapko?
Customer: No sir.
Executive: Aap aap dekho lead manager pe sir inquiries nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achha indirect inquiries kam hai?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Okay okay ek second. Aur direct inquiries kam hai kyuki dekho ek to aapki rating review thodi matlab website pe nahi hai matlab bilkul zero hai rating review. To rating review pe aap dhyan do lead manager pe maine aapko sikhaya tha thik hai rating review kaise lete hai aur direct inquiry me aapko bataya tha ki profile jiski jaldi hoti hai buyer usi ke profile pe jaake inquiry dalte hai thik hai. To ultimately rating review kaha pe kaam aata hai to visibility aapka badhane me kaam aata hai promote karne me kaam aata hai website ko thik hai. To jitna zyada aap rating review lo rating review lo aap dekho ek bhi rating nahi hai aapka thik hai even though business hua bhi hoga but still unhone bhi rate nahi kiya aapko. To thoda sa aap rating review pe dhyan do rating review lo buyer se aapna. To sir mai ye jo website hai website se unko directly review puchu ya direct whatsapp pe message karu?
Executive: Aap aap aap kholo lead manager pe jao system pe ho na aap?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Lead manager pe jaaiye.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Aur koi bhi lead waha se open kijiye.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Aur dekho right side me view mode likha hoga hai na?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: View more pe click kijiye aur ask for review pe click kijiye aur uske baad us waha dekho whatsapp ka link aayega us pe click kijiye uske whatsapp pe chala jayega. To jab aap client se baat karte ho na to ye wali ye wali function ko use karo aur client ko bolo sir please rate me five star lo aap se thik hai bahut simple hai. Aap rating review badhega aapka business badhega aapka inquiries badh jayega aapka.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Baki aapke call response thik hai product pe aapka scoring bhi achha hai almost aapka sab product me aapka scoring thik hai sab apne humne add kar rakha hai lagbhag lagbhag koi bhi items missing nahi hai na. Thik hai?
Customer: No sir.
Executive: Aur koi concern?
Customer: No sir.
Executive: Thik hai to jis jis category ka aapko zyada lead chahiye us category ko zyada utilize karo thik hai system me zyada filter lagao usme aur ho sake to us filter ko aap save kar lo thik hai.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai aur aapki ye concern close karu madam?
Customer: Aur no sir aur koi concern nahi.
Executive: Thik hai to ye jo aapne raise kiya wo close kar do na.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Thik hai ek feedback mil jayega please mark satisfied okay.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries for biomass are more.

- Wants more inquiries for boiler maintenance.

- Indirect inquiries are less.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested steps to find leads.

- Executive explained how to get rating reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to close the raised concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, rating review, boiler maintenance
